subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Tackle Robert Nkemdiche, the cornerstone of the Rebels’ 2013 recruiting class, approaches football cerebrally and leans on Zen to keep himself in a good place.
snippet: Tackle Robert Nkemdiche, the cornerstone of the Rebels’ 2013 recruiting class, approaches football cerebrally and leans on Zen to keep himself in a good place.
